attributes.action: Ban websites / 3rd parties selling EHIC cards which are FREE !!!
attributes.additional_details:
This is a e-petition to request the UK Government to Ban websites / 3rd parties selling EHIC cards which are FREE to the UK public.

There are number of rouge websites which are trying to charge for a FREE EHIC card.

Websites should be closed down and banned for selling UK Government services that are Free for the UK public.
